string.value: Send a congratulatory message through #b#p9010010##k to celebrate MapleStory's 5th Anniversary.
If you truly want to congratulate MapleStory for reaching its 5th Anniversary, go see #b#p9010010##k to send your congratulatory message.
You congratulated MapleStory for reaching its 5th Anniversary.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Go see #p9010010# and deliver your #bMapleStory 5th Anniversary#k congratulatory message.
By the way, you do know that Maple's Anniversary is #bMay 11#k, right?\r\n#b#L0#Of course I know.#l\n#k
So, have you prepared a cake? It looks like you're empty-handed.\r\n#b#L0#I didn't prepare anything...#l\n#k

Hmpf! That's what I figured.\r\nFine, since I, #p9010010#, am as kind as I am beautiful, I'll let it pass if you say the phrase, "Congratulations to MapleStory for reaching its 5th Anniversary," from the bottom of your heart.\r\nWhat do you think?
So, you're willing to do it? Great! All it takes is one simple phrase. Rehearse it and see me when you're ready to congratulate MapleStory.
If you truly love Maple, don't you think you should congratulate the game on its 5th Anniversary? Come back to me if you change your mind.
